column1: West Drayton
Adjustments to Sectional Running Times
Movement
Train arriving or passing throughPlatform 5 from London.
Up trains from Colnbrook Branchpassing West Drayton
Planning Restriction

Trains longer than 71SLU planned to dwell in West Drayton Loop/Platform 5 in the down direction will foul the Relieflines. Therefore if a train longer than 71 SLU is planned, junction margins must be based on the trains departuretime from West Drayton, not its arrival time.
